topic.name: Technical Digital Safety (Cybersecurity)
topic.description: 13-year academic progression (K-12) for Technical Digital Safety (Cybersecurity) in Personal Relationships, Identity & Digital Discipleship

objectives.sub_topic_name: Digital Footprints (The permanence of online actions)
Digital Footprints (The permanence of online actions)
Digital Footprints (The permanence of online actions)

objectives.objective_text: Identify a key locking a door.
Name safe people to share with (parents).
Identify nice words vs. mean words.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Digital Footprints (The permanence of online actions)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that internet pictures stay forever.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Digital Footprints (The permanence of online actions)
objectives.objective_text: Observe that deleting isn't always gone.
Summarize strong passwords (long, mix of letters/numbers).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Digital Footprints (The permanence of online actions)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the 'Billboard Test' (would you put it on a billboard?).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Digital Footprints (The permanence of online actions)
Digital Footprints (The permanence of online actions)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the right to be forgotten (limitations).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Digital Footprints (The permanence of online actions)
objectives.objective_text: Defend integrity in all spheres of life.
Defend the use of hardware keys or authenticator apps.
Summarize checking settings on a game.
Explain that 'Free' apps sell our info.
Defend the right to digital privacy.
Summarize why we don't chat with strangers.
Explain how to report a bully.
Defend the protection of oneself and others.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Digital Footprints (The permanence of online actions)
objectives.objective_text: Compare temporary feelings with permanent posts.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Digital Footprints (The permanence of online actions)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze how colleges/employers check social media.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Digital Footprints (The permanence of online actions)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the archive capability of the web.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Digital Footprints (The permanence of online actions)

objectives.objective_text: Analyze the risks of reusing passwords.
Compare a diary vs. a blog.
Analyze the permanence of the 'Digital Footprint'.
Connect data collection to targeted ads.
Analyze the risks of private messaging apps.
Interpret the boundaries of healthy communication.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Digital Footprints (The permanence of online actions)

objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the strength of entropy in passwords.
Evaluate the trade-off between convenience and privacy.
Explain why we don't click strange links.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Digital Footprints (The permanence of online actions)
objectives.objective_text: Construct a digital reputation management strategy.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Digital Footprints (The permanence of online actions)
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize long-term thinking with instant communication.
Construct a privacy audit of social media accounts.
Synthesize legal rights (GDPR) with personal habits.
Compare a real deal vs. a scam.
Construct a boundary policy for online interaction.
Synthesize conflict resolution with digital tools.
Construct a defense against identity theft.
